card.name: Blaithi Armsmaster
card.text: Double strike This creature can't block alone. Whenever an opponent is dealt damage by a source you control for the first time each turn, this creature pillages. (Put a +1/+1 counter on it. Whenever it deals combat damage to a player this turn, you may remove one to draw a card.)

card.name: Cloak in Rime
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has protection from mana value 2 or greater. (This permanent can't be targeted, dealt damage, enchanted, or equipped by anything with mana value 2 or greater..) When enchanted creature deals damage, sacrifice this Aura.

card.name: Blackwings' Blessing
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets -2/-2, can't block, and can't be blocked.

card.name: Day's End Rest
card.text: Choose one or both— • Counter all abilities. • Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.

card.name: Gracious Mycologist
card.text: When this creature enters and at the beginning of your upkeep, put a spore counter on it. Remove two spore counters from this creature: Choose one— • Create a 1/1 white Saproling creature token. • Return a creature or artifact card with mana value 1 from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Kin & Kiln
card.text: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control, then remove any number of counters from among creatures you control. For each counter removed this way, add {R} and you gain 1 life.

card.name: Eternities' Wake
card.text: Whenever a creature you control attacks and isn't blocked, you may prevent all damage that creature would deal this turn. At the beginning of your postcombat main phase, if damage was prevented this turn, add that much {C} and draw a card. You can cast only one more spell this turn.

card.name: Simul, the Veil-Cursed
card.text: --- (Back): In Search of a Spark

card.name: In Search of a Spark
card.text: Put a -1/-1 counter on each of up to X target creatures, where X is your legacy. (Your legacy is the number of legendary permanents you control plus legends in your graveyard.) Proliferate. --- (Front): Simul, the Veil-Cursed

card.name: Autumnal Vale
card.text: Autumnal Vale enters the battlefield tapped unless you control another Plains. {T}: Add {W}. {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Autumnal Vale: Search your library for a basic Mountain card and a basic Forest card. Reveal those cards, put one onto the battlefield tapped and the other into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Back // Forth
card.text:
Untap each permanent you control. If {VG}{VG} or {VW}{VW} was spent to cast this spell, draw a card. ({VG} is mana from basic forests.)
---
After this main phase, there is an additional combat phase. If {VR} or {VW} was spent to cast this spell, each creature can't block more than once this turn.

card.name: Delving Nixie
card.text: Trample, haste Whenever Delving Nixie deals combat damage to a player, you may pay {1}{VG}. If you do, create a token that's a copy of Delving Nixie. Otherwise, create a 3/1 green Ouphe creature token with trample and haste.

card.name: Earnest Vassal
card.text: Earnest Vassal must be blocked if able. {2}{R}: Earnest Vassal gets +3/+0 until end of turn. If {VR} was spent to activate this ability, it also gains menace until end of turn. ({VR} is mana from basic mountains.)

card.name: Harvest Sentinel
card.text: Harvest Sentinel costs {1} less to cast for each {VW} spent to cast it. ({VW} is mana from basic plains.) Harvest Sentinel's power and toughness are each equal to the number of plains you control.

card.name: Ouphe SS
card.text: Trample, haste

card.name: Observance of the Sacred
card.text: Whenever a player attacks, for each favor counter you have, you may choose an attacking creature. Untap that creature and remove it from combat unless its controller pays {2}. At the beginning of your end step, if you have no favor counters, pray.

card.name: Soldier Devout
card.text: Whenever Soldier Devout attacks, pray, then Soldier Devout deals damage to target creature an opponent controls equal to the number of favor counters you have. (You get a favor counter. Spend six as a sorcery to create a 4/4 white Angel creature token with flying.)

card.name: Parry
card.text: Target creature you control gains first strike until end of turn. Then for each other instant spell, sorcery spell, or ability that targets only that creature, choose one. • Choose new targets for that spell or ability. • Copy that spell or ability.

card.name: Trollsbane Punk
card.text: Convicted — Whenever you cast your second spell each turn, until end of turn, Trollsbane Punk has base power and toughness 3/3, gains hexproof, and becomes a Giant in addition to its other types.

card.name: Moment of Privacy
card.text: Spend only blue mana on X. X target creatures you control phase out. If X is 2, first put a +1/+1 counter on each of those creatures. (Treat those creatures and anything attached to them as though they don't exist until your next turn.)

card.name: Carrion Peddler
card.text: Whenever a creature you control scavenges for +1/+1 counters, create half that many 0/1 white Human creature tokens, rounded down. {2}, Sacrifice another Human: Carrion Peddler gains trample until end of turn. You gain 3 life.

card.name: Blighted Hunt
card.text: Deathtouch When a creature scavenges Blighted Hunt, it gains deathtouch and haste. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step. Scavenge {BG} ({BG}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Put a number of +1/+1 counters equal to this card's power on target creature. Scavenge only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Ritual Warden
card.text: {2}{B}, Sacrifice a permanent: Look at the top X cards of your library, where X is the sacrificed permanent's mana value. Put one of those cards into your hand, then shuffle. Minimalist — Whenever another nontoken permanent is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, Ritual Warden gains indestructible until end of turn.

card.name: Scarlet Crucible
card.text: Minimalist — Whenever a nontoken permanent is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, you gain 1 life. If Scarlet Crucible was that permanent, return a permanent card with lesser mana value from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Nunieve's Aspirant
card.text: Whenever Nunieve's Aspirant deals combat damage to a player, you may draw that many cards. If you do, put that many cards minus one from your hand on top of your library in any order.

card.name: Glint in the Depths
card.text: --- (Back): Celestial Sphere

card.name: Celestial Sphere
card.text: When this transforms into Celestial Sphere, exile target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard. If you would draw a card, you may instead cast a copy of the exiled card. (You still pay its costs.) --- (Front): Glint in the Depths

card.name: Motley Wayfinder
card.text: When Motley Wayfinder enters the battlefield, surveil 1. If you lost life since your last turn, Motley Wayfinder explores instead.

card.name: Rainfall
card.text: Creatures have base power 0 until end of turn. You may put a stun counter on each attacking creature.

card.name: Scarwood Pilferer
card.text: Whenever Scarwood Pilferer attacks, gain control of up to one target artifact. It loses all abilities. {2}{U}: Exile target Equipment you control. Return it to the battlefield under your control and attached to Scarwood Pilferer.

card.name: Grandfather's Blade
card.text: Equipped creature gets +1/+0 and has haste. Whenever a creature enters the battlefield from your graveyard, you may attach this to it. If Grandfather's Blade is in your graveyard, instead return it to the battlefield and attach it to that creature.

card.name: Clow Cards, Reclaimed
card.text: Shuffle your hand into your library. For each card shuffled this way, you may reveal an instant or sorcery card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand. End the turn. --- (Back): Tomoyo's Claim

card.name: Tomoyo's Claim
card.text: --- (Front): Clow Cards, Reclaimed

card.name: Coffee Medium
card.text: When Coffee Medium enters, exile the top three cards of your library. Until end of turn, you may play one of the exiled cards for each color of mana spent to cast this spell. --- (Back): Coven Café

card.name: Coven Café
card.text: {T}, Pay 1 life: Add {R}. {2}, {T}, Discard a card: Return Coven Café to its owner's hand. Activate only as a sorcery. --- (Front): Coffee Medium

card.name: Record Spill
card.text: Target opponent discards two cards. Then if that player discarded fewer cards than colors of mana spent to cast this spell, you draw cards and gain life equal to the difference. --- (Back): Cult's Corner Shop

card.name: Cult's Corner Shop
card.text: {T}, Pay 1 life: Add {B}. {2}, {T}, Discard a card: Return Cult's Corner Shop to its owner's hand. Activate only as a sorcery. --- (Front): Record Spill

card.name: Lift the Veil
card.text: Return target permanent you control to its owner's hand. You may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast the next spell you cast if it shares a color with the card returned this way.

card.name: Familiar's Friend // Why Pick One?
card.text:
Menace Esteem 2 (Whenever this untaps, you may put a +1/+1 counter on it. As you do, if it has two or more, it becomes legendary and loses this ability.)
---
Create two 1/1 black Cat creature tokens for each counter among creatures you control. (Cast a copy of this spell once, only while you control this creature and a legend.)

prop.type: Creature — Human Warlock // Legendary Sorcery — Tale

card.name: Pumpkin Farmers
card.text: Defender, vigilance Sacrifice a Food: Add {G}. {1}, {T}: Create a Food token. Esteem 2 (Whenever this untaps, you may put a +1/+1 counter on it. As you do, if it has two or more, it becomes legendary and loses this ability.) When Pumpkin Farmers becomes legendary, it loses defender.

card.name: Speeding Ticket
card.text: Enchant creature or artifact Enchanted permanent can't attack or block unless its controller pays {3}. If one or more counters would be put on enchanted permanent, put that many stun counters on it instead. --- (Back): Taking It Slow

card.name: Taking It Slow
card.text: Creatures your opponents control get -4/-0 until end of turn. Scry 1. --- (Front): Speeding Ticket

card.name: Kaede, Dayspring Snoop
card.text: Whenever you cast an instant, sorcery, or artifact spell, choose one— • You gain 2 life and mill 2. • Create a 1/1 red Elemental creature token with "This creature can't block." --- (Back): Sunkissed Kaede

card.name: Sunkissed Kaede
card.text: Flying, trample At the beginning of your postcombat main phase, choose any number of target instant, sorcery, and/or artifact cards in your graveyard with total mana value X or less, where X is the combat damage dealt to players this turn. You may cast those cards without paying their mana costs. --- (Front): Kaede, Dayspring Snoop

card.name: Manamorphose
card.text: Add two mana in any combination of colors. Draw a card.

card.name: Tobi's Heart-Splinter
card.text: Whenever an enchantment card is put into your graveyard from anywhere, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life. {2}: Surveil 1, then sacrifice Tobi's Heart-Splinter. When you do, draw a card. (To surveil 1, look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.)

card.name: Take Another Breath
card.text: Target nonland, nonartifact permanent gains indestructible. You gain 2 life. At the beginning of your next turn's end step, that permanent's controller sacrifices it. When they do, that player draws a card.

card.name: Lorelei No Longer
card.text: At the beginning of combat on each opponent's turn, you may exert Lorelei. When you do, target creature attacks this combat if able. (An exerted creature won't untap during your next untap step.) {1}{U}, {T}: Create a token copy of each creature Lorelei blocked this turn. --- (Back): Lorelei's Unraveling

card.name: Lorelei's Unraveling
card.text: Exile target creature. For as long as it remains exiled, its owner may cast it. At the beginning of your next main phase, add mana equal to its mana cost. --- (Front): Lorelei No Longer

card.name: Eyes Agape
card.text: ({UP} can be paid with either {U} or 2 life. {BP} can be paid with either {B} or 2 life.) Draw a card for each color of mana spent to cast this spell, then discard a card unless you lost life this turn.

card.name: Surge Protector
card.text: Whenever you expend 5, untap this artifact and it becomes a 5/5 Golem creature until end of turn. (You expend 5 as you spend your fifth total mana to cast spells during a turn.) {1}, {T}: Add {C}{U}.

card.name: Dryad of Dusk's Whisper
card.text: Eclipse (As this enters, phase it out, or phase out another creature you control until it leaves the battlefield. It gains that creature's abilities.) If a triggered ability of this permanent would trigger, that ability triggers an additional time.

card.name: Legion's Echo
card.text: Deathtouch Inspired — Whenever this creature becomes untapped, search your library for a card with the same name, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Gentle Jackalope
card.text: Lifelink, ward {1} If a creature you control with mana value 1 would leave the battlefield, you may instead phase it out until this creature leaves the battlefield.

card.name: Chevalier Rosé
card.text: Vigilance Noncreature spells cost {WP} more to cast. ({WP} can be paid with either {W} or 2 life.)

card.name: Crawling from the Drink
card.text: At the beginning of each combat, you may put a stun counter on target land you control. If you do, until end of turn, it becomes a 3/2 Horror creature with vigilance that is still a land. Sacrifice this enchantment: Return up to three target land cards from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Spectramorphosis
card.text: This spell costs {1}{B} less to cast if it targets a creature you control. Choose target nontoken creature, then create a token that's a copy of it except it's a 1/1 Insect Spirit and has flying. Exile the chosen creature until the token leaves the battlefield.

card.name: Mossback Elk
card.text: Whenever a creature card leaves your graveyard or is put into your graveyard from anywhere other than the battlefield for the first time each turn, put a vigor counter on this creature. (When a creature attacks, remove its vigor counters. It gets +2/+2 until end of turn for each.)

card.name: Sacred Starseeker
card.text: Flying Whenever a creature you control leaves the battlefield, you gain 1 life. Shuffle this card from your graveyard into your library: Draw a card. Activate only if you gained 5 or more life this turn.

card.name: Obsession Crown
card.text: Flash Enchant creature Enchanted creature has trample and "Discard a card: This creature deals 1 damage to each creature blocking it."

card.name: Obviation Crown
card.text: Flash Enchant creature Enchanted creature has "Discard a card: This creature phases out." (Treat it and anything attached to it as though they don't exist until its controller's next turn.)

card.name: Obligation Crown
card.text: Flash Enchant creature Discard a card: Gain control of enchanted creature until end of turn.

card.name: Obtention Crown
card.text: Flash Enchant creature Enchanted creature has reach and "Discard a card: Untap this creature."

card.name: Harmonious Migration
card.text: Whenever a creature entering causes a triggered ability to trigger, if that ability targets exactly one creature you control, you may copy that ability for each other creature you control that ability could target. Each copy targets a different one of those creatures.
